title: "Feature: User Profile Pages"

## Description
Implement user profile pages where students can view and manage their participation, interests, and activity history.

## New Features
- Student profile pages with personal information
- Activity history and registrations
- Interests and preferences settings
- Profile visibility settings
- Activity statistics (events attended, etc.)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User profiles are viewable by authenticated users
- [ ] Activity history displays correctly
- [ ] Users can edit their profile information
- [ ] Privacy settings functional
- [ ] Profile statistics are accurate
